author: cschoett
msg: Reverted my last change to this file - back compat issues.

author: rich
msg: Added a warning that appears when you override validate() on a class that extends the (deprecated) FormData.  If you do this, declarative validation annotations won't work unless you call super.validate().
Also, made some changes to the compiler test framework:

- The file that contains expected warnings/errors had everything concatenated to a single line, with no delimiter between each line.  This made it really difficult to figure out what went wrong when there was a diff.  In addition, the expected/actual output files were compared by chopping up the single-line output into pieces using ',' as the delimiter (not sure why), then sorting it.  I changed all this so that the files contain multiple lines, just like the real compiler output.
- Fixed to clear the warningsorerrors.actual file before each run of apt.  Without this, you had to run 'test.clean test.build' before 'compiler.bvt' each time.

author: dims
msg: Fix for AXIS2-290 - Change bundled STAX implementation
